Fullcodes App Library

This is the official Fullcodes Repository.

Currently it serves 3 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Finnlikecookies/FullcodesRepo/master/fdroid/repo/

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
0F 31 C0 21 B4 17 43 ED CA 1A 06 7D 72 FF E2 BA 65 2B 59 97 30 54 58 59 E8 6E 37 D8 7F 81 DD 97
